title: Mini-Ep 60: Wholehearted Living with Ellen Fondiler
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 60: Wholehearted Living with Ellen Fondiler
itunes:subtitle: This week Kate fields listener questions about work and jobs with career strategist and past Forever35 guest Ellen Fondiler. They lend advice to a listener dealing with imposter syndrome, consider what it means to be a good manager, give tips for deali...
description:
This week Kate fields listener questions about work and jobs with career strategist and past Forever35 guest Ellen Fondiler. They lend advice to a listener dealing with imposter syndrome, consider what it means to be a good manager, give tips for dealing with burnout, and dig into wholehearted living.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

*Ellen will be answering listener questions in the Forever35 Newsletter about career, work and getting "unstuck". To submit a question, send us an email at forever35podcast@gmail.com with the subject line: Ask Ellen.

This episode is sponsored by:

  • Reina Rebelde - Use code ForeverReina at checkout for 10% off your Reina Rebelde products on Amazon.com. Code is valid until June 10, 2019.
  • Living Proof - Visit livingproof.com/forever35 and use promo code FOREVER35 to get a FREE sample of their dry shampoo with your purchase.
  • Mistress of the Ritz by Melanie Benjamin.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
